examples.example: 我们都应该努力学好普通话，以便更好地与他人交流沟通。

translate.english: We all should strive to learn Mandarin well in order to communicate better with others.

examples.example: 我一直努力练习普通话，希望能更清晰流畅地表达自己的想法。

translate.english: I have been constantly striving to practice Mandarin, hoping to express my own thoughts more clearly and fluently.

examples.example: 学好普通话，能让我们在各种场合更加自信地展示自己。

translate.english: Learning Mandarin well can enable us to show ourselves more confidently in various occasions.
